summary: After a dreadful incident coupled with an ungovernable paroxysm of violence, a butcher will fall into a downward spiral that will burn to the ground whatever dignity still remained in him.
cast: Philippe Nahon|Blandine Lenoir|Frankie Pain|Marie Berto|Hélène Testud|Frédéric Bodson|Roland Guéridon|Roger Lerain|Zaven|Charles Léger|Alain Rabaud|Farid N'Haoua|Selim Yacine|Michel Berto|Pierre Jamin|Salem Abdoune|François Robert|Lucile Hadzihalilovic
title: Carne
